publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6661 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Caledonia Clubhouse, Falkirkâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Caledonia Clubhouse, based in Falkirk, for achieving the Silver Standard at the Gardening Scotland Show; acknowledges the work of Forth Valley College in assisting the clubhouse in creating the Celtic motif pallet as its emblem, and wishes Caledonia Clubhouse well when it hosts its annual T in the Garden event during the summer.
S3M-6661 Congratulations to Caledonia Clubhouse, Falkirk (lodged on 25 June 2010) Rob Gibson*, Cathy Peattie*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Liam McArthur*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-6661 Congratulations to Caledonia Clubhouse, Falkirk (lodged on 25 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Maureen Watt*
